Interface ChecksService

    • Method Detail

      • createCheck

        @Headers(value="Content-Type:application/json")
 @POST(value="api/v2/checks")
retrofit2.Call<Check> createCheck(@Body
                                                                                                                Check check)
        Add new check
        Parameters:
        check - check to create (required)
        Returns:
        Call<Check>

      • deleteChecksID

        @DELETE(value="api/v2/checks/{checkID}")
retrofit2.Call<Void> deleteChecksID(@Path(value="checkID")
                                                                             String checkID,
                                                                             @Header(value="Zap-Trace-Span")
                                                                             String zapTraceSpan)
        Delete a check
        Parameters:
        checkID - ID of check (required)
        zapTraceSpan - OpenTracing span context (optional)
        Returns:
        Call<Void>

      • getChecks

        @GET(value="api/v2/checks")
retrofit2.Call<Checks> getChecks(@Query(value="orgID")
                                                             String orgID,
                                                             @Query(value="offset")
                                                             Integer offset,
                                                             @Query(value="limit")
                                                             Integer limit)
        Get all checks
        Parameters:
        orgID - only show checks belonging to specified organization (required)
        offset - (optional)
        limit - (optional, default to 20)
        Returns:
        Call<Checks>

      • getChecksID

        @GET(value="api/v2/checks/{checkID}")
retrofit2.Call<Check> getChecksID(@Path(value="checkID")
                                                                        String checkID,
                                                                        @Header(value="Zap-Trace-Span")
                                                                        String zapTraceSpan)
        Get an check
        Parameters:
        checkID - ID of check (required)
        zapTraceSpan - OpenTracing span context (optional)
        Returns:
        Call<Check>

      • patchChecksID

        @Headers(value="Content-Type:application/json")
 @PATCH(value="api/v2/checks/{checkID}")
retrofit2.Call<Check> patchChecksID(@Path(value="checkID")
                                                                                                                             String checkID,
                                                                                                                             @Body
                                                                                                                             Check check,
                                                                                                                             @Header(value="Zap-Trace-Span")
                                                                                                                             String zapTraceSpan)
        Update a check
        Parameters:
        checkID - ID of check (required)
        check - check update to apply (required)
        zapTraceSpan - OpenTracing span context (optional)
        Returns:
        Call<Check>
